meanings.definition: A person or thing that screeches loudly.
meanings.sent1: The screechers in the forest woke me up with their loud cries.
meanings.sent2: The screechers at the zoo were the loudest animals there.
meanings.sent3: The screechers at the party made it impossible to have a quiet conversation.
meanings.sent4: The screechers in the horror movie added to the eerie atmosphere.
meanings.sent5: The screechers in the haunted house tour scared all the visitors.

meanings.sent1: We heard the screechers approaching from a distance.
meanings.sent2: The screechers gathered in the park for their annual meeting.
meanings.sent3: The screechers in the choir harmonized beautifully during the performance.
meanings.sent4: The screechers in the sky were actually a flock of migrating birds.
meanings.sent5: The screechers in the barn were causing quite a commotion.
